key_takeaways: Solution: Use AI tools like Grok 3 and Cursor to generate game code with simple prompts (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Create AI-generated games with cash prize competitions to drive engagement and email collection (Channel: viral)

Strategy: Using AI-generated games as lead magnets with gamified incentives
Strategy: Using viral AI content to drive multiple revenue streams
